channel.title: Posts on Chris Turner
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Chris Turner

item.title: The Bee Movie Script
item.description: You like jazz? According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway because bees don't care what humans think is impossible. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Ooh, black and yellow! Let's shake it up a little.

item.title: Reticulate: Using R Studio and Python Together
item.description: Working with Reticulate If you didn't know, the reticulated python is one of the longest and heaviest snakes found in Southeast and South Asia. It's a bit hard to handle in captivity due to the fact that it does what it's known to do: be a snake that likes to kill stuff. Look at this cutie! However, there is no such thing as a "reticulated R" in the wild.
